name: Ctrl-Alt-Move
description:
Ctrl-Alt-Move is a 3D puzzle-platformer where you have one of three abilities, but you have no control over which one you're going to get. You can either fly across gaps as a paper airplane, fling yourself through the air with a slingshot, or shoot to move with a gun. Each ability causes you to play the game in a different way. Try to get to one of three golden blocks while avoiding and attacking enemies to win.

Controls:                                                                                                                      WASD to Move.
Move the mouse to look around.
Left Click to fire your gun.
Right Click to use your ability
Paper Airplane: Right Click once to activate the plane, and right click again to deactivate it.
Slingshot: Right Click once to begin charging up the slingshot. Right click again to release.
Gun: Right Click once to shoot. Wait a little for the bullet to explode and then you will be propelled.
An icon depicting your ability is in the upper-right hand corner of the screen.
Press E on a golden block to win the game!
